remarks: Lemma for ~ lawcos .  Here we prove the law for a point at the origin and two distinct points U and V, using an expanded version of the signed angle expression on the complex plane.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lawcoslem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. CC ) $.
lawcoslem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> V e. CC ) $.
lawcoslem1.3 $e |- ( ph -> U =/= 0 ) $.
lawcoslem1.4 $e |- ( ph -> V =/= 0 ) $.
